This image is associated with the following caption: 'My 13 - year-old daughter is having surgery tomorrow . She 's scared . I 'm scared . In fact , I woke up in the wee hours of the morning imagining all the things that could go wrong . But deep down inside I know worry serves no purpose here . So - taking slow , deep breaths - I 'm turning this over to God . God gave her father and me this child to love and teach and help her grow into a beautiful woman who makes a meaningful impact on this world . That 's a big job , but I know He never expected us to do it alone . He has been there every step of the way . He will be there tomorrow at the hospital , guiding the skilled hands of the doctors . He will be present in the kindness and attentiveness of the nurses . When anxiety and fear take hold , we will turn to Him for strength and comfort . Times like these are when we need to let our faith be bigger than our fears . Let go and let God .'.
